summary: Toad (David Jason), Rat (Ian Carmichael), Mole (Richard Pearson), and Badger (Sir Michael Hordern) follow animal etiquette in this version of Kenneth Grahame's classic, in stop-motion model animation.
cast: Richard Pearson|Ian Carmichael|David Jason|Michael Hordern|Beryl Reid|Jonathan Cecil|Edward Kelsey|Una Stubbs|Brian Trueman|Alan Bardsley
title: The Wind in the Willows
